verses.roman:
tapana-miśra tabe tāṅre kailā nimantraṇa
prabhu kahe,--'kṣaura karāha, yāha, sanātana'

synonyms: tapana-miśra—Tapana Miśra; tabe—then; tāṅre—unto him (Sanātana Gosvāmī); kailā—made; nimantraṇa—invitation; prabhu kahe—Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; kṣaura karāha—get shaved; yāha—go; sanātana—My dear Sanātana.
translation: Tapana Miśra then extended an invitation to Sanātana, and Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu asked Sanātana to go get a shave.
